title.narrative: Number of Municipal Education Councils whose management is focused on removing barriers to the access and permanence of children in school.
Number of graduate and post graduate multicultural courses for indigenous teachers.
Number of educational books published by the MEC in an inclusive format.
Number of schools in Irala Fernndez that have School Risk Management Plan.
Number of barriers, differentiated by sex, that prevent the access and permanence of children and adolescents in school, removed in Irala Fernndez
Number of indigenous groups that implemented asamblies and were represented at the National Counsil of Indigenous Education.
Number of schools implementing innovative approaches to improve access, permanence and learning in Irala Fernndez
Number of schools in Irala Fernndez that have bathrooms separated by sex and suitable for the use of girls and boys.

Analysis of determinants and barriers that prevent the access and permanence of children in school (especially in pre-school, 3rd cycle of Basic and Secondary), differentiated by sex, at national level and at Irala Fernndez.
